ratings.comment: I didn't plan on taking more Spanish classes than I had to but then I met her and she encouraged me to get a minor in Spanish.  She is super caring and funny.  She is also willing to talk through anything with you.

I expected Spanish classes in college to be hard but Profesora Giardiello made it manageable. She's hilarious, helpful, and challenges her students to produce their best work. She assigns almost daily homework and a few readings but if you keep up with it, it's totally doable. You really have to study for this class and give it your best effort.

Awesome teacher, holds office hours to correct your essays with you - go to these and you'll do fine. Really cool teacher, would definitely take another class of hers if I had the chance. Super funny!

I was not going to continue on with Spanish until I came to Giannina's class the first day. She's hilarious and makes you feel really comfortable talking in class. SHE IS MY FAVORITE SPANISH TEACHER EVER!

Giannina is such a fun professor.  She genuinely cares about her students and tries to make grammar interesting.  She goes out of her way to hold multiple office hours to review essays for students.  I would take another class with her in a heartbeat!

reviews all the grammar that you have ever learned (helpful)and I feel like I have improved my Spanish a lot. Giannina is very easy-going and enjoys being humorous. She has office hours at Espresso Royal coffee shop, where you can easily get help or correct your essays ahead of time for an easy A. Very manageable, low-stress class.Highly recommend!
I've taken spanish since 3rd grade and I've NEVER had a teacher like this. She is absolutely HILARIOUS and makes every activity outrageous and so much fun. I'm literally obsessed with her..
LOVED having class with her! She was very helpful and very available outside of class! She seems to like teaching and it showed.
